title:
What was the Battle of Rockfish?



I was driving through Duplin County and saw a sign about it.  I have lived around here most of my life and I have never heard about it.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.ncmarkers.com/Markers.aspx?ct=ddl&sp=search&k=Markers&sv=F-7%20-%20BATTLE%20OF%20ROCKFISH
